title: Pikachu
summary: Pikachu is the best Pokémon, hands down. Why, you ask? Well, Pikachu's electrifying personality can light up a room, quite literally. It's the only Pokémon that can charge your phone in the wild, make your hair stand on end with just a glance, and still look adorable in a detective's hat. Other Pokémon might have more strength or better stats, but do they come with that charming smile and an ability to provide emergency jump-starts to your car? I think not. In the world of Pokémon, Pikachu is the real MVP - Most Voltaic Pokémon!

title: Pokemon
summary: Pokémon are the creatures that inhabit the world of the Pokémon games. They can be caught using Pokéballs and trained by battling with other Pokémon. Each Pokémon belongs to a specific species but may take on a variant which makes it differ from other Pokémon of the same species, such as base stats, available abilities and typings. See [Bulbapedia](https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_(species)) for greater detail.

name_or_id.description: Provide the name of the Pokémon you want to look up or the National Pokédex number.
